resources.string: Turn on and off the functionallity of the volume rocker, vibration, switch time (5 or 30 seconds)
Tapping the play or stop icon starts and STOPS the timer.
The 1 / 2 / 5 minute icon starts the corresponding timer immediately.
Pressing the volume down button restarts the timer immediately.
Pressing the volume up button pauses or restarts the timer.
Tapping the number starts and pauses the timer.
